code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with progressive Mental Health for past 2 days. she is a white female aged 27 ys. o:Height 64 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:a female violinist aged 29 yrs presents with 5 weeks history of worsening Mental Health. o:Height 64 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 97.6 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.
